quotes.message: Be saving, but not at the cost of all liberality. Have the soul of a king and the hand of a wise economist.
quotes.name: Joseph Joubert

quotes.message: Look everywhere you can to cut a little bit from your expenses. It will all add up to a meaningful sum.
quotes.name: Suze Orman

quotes.message: The quickest way to double your money is to fold it in half and put it in your back pocket.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: You must learn to save first and spend afterwards.
quotes.name: John Poole

quotes.message: Balancing your money is the key to having enough.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Warren

quotes.message: Saving must become a priority, not just a thought. Pay yourself first.
quotes.name: Dave Ramsey

quotes.message: The habit of saving is itself an education; it fosters every virtue, teaches self-denial, cultivates the sense of order, trains to forethought, and so broadens the mind.
quotes.name: T.T. Munger

quotes.message: Many people take no care of their money till they come nearly to the end of it, and others do just the same with their time.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: It's good to have money and the things that money can buy, but it's good, too, to check up once in a while and make sure that you haven't lost the things that money can't buy.
quotes.name: George Lorimer

quotes.message: By definition, saving for anything requires us to not get things now so that we can get bigger ones later.
quotes.name: Jean Chatzky

quotes.message: The art is not in making money, but in keeping it.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: He who will not economize will have to agonize.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: The easiest way to save money is to waste less energy.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: A simple fact that is hard to learn is that the time to save money is when you have some.
quotes.name: Joe Moore

quotes.message: Saving is a very fine thing. Especially when your parents have done it for you.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Money looks better in the bank than on your feet.
quotes.name: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.message: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: If we command our wealth, we shall be rich and free. If our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: When a man has learned to live without money, he thought, a few rubles can go a long way.
quotes.name: Dan Millman

quotes.message: Spend not where you may save; spare not where you must spend.
quotes.name: John Ray

quotes.message: Save a little money each month and at the end of the year you'll be surprised at how little you have.
quotes.name: Ernest Haskins

quotes.message: Money has never made man happy, nor will it, there is nothing in its nature to produce happiness. The more of it one has the more one wants.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: A man is usually more careful of his money than he is of his principles.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: If you can count your money, you don't have a billion dollars.
quotes.name: J. Paul Getty

quotes.message: There is a gigantic difference between earning a great deal of money and being rich.
quotes.name: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.message: If you wish to get rich, save what you get. A fool can earn money; but it takes a wise man to save and dispose of it to his own advantage.
quotes.name: Brigham Young

quotes.message: Saving requires us to not get things now so that we can get bigger ones later.
quotes.name: Jean Chatzky

quotes.message: All days are not same. Save for a rainy day. When you don't work, savings will work for you.
quotes.name: M.K. Soni

quotes.message: A penny saved is a penny earned.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Money is a guarantee that we may have what we want in the future. Though we need nothing at the moment it insures the possibility of satisfying a new desire when it arises.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: If you cannot save money, the seeds of greatness are not in you.
quotes.name: W. Clement Stone

quotes.message: A man who both spends and saves money is the happiest man, because he has both enjoyments.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you.
quotes.name: Lydia Sweatt

quotes.message: Saving comes too late when you get to the bottom.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Money is multiplied in practical value depending on the number of W's you control in your life: what you do, when you do it, where you do it, and with whom you do it.
quotes.name: Timothy Ferriss

quotes.message: Stop buying things you don't need to impress people you don't even like.
quotes.name: Suze Orman

quotes.message: A man is rich in proportion to the things he can afford to let alone.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: People suddenly know how to use money when there are none left.
quotes.name: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.message: Save one-third, live on one-third, and give away one-third.
quotes.name: Angelina Jolie

quotes.message: Save money on the big, boring stuff so that you have something left over for life's little pleasures.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Leam

quotes.message: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.
quotes.name: Warren Buffet

quotes.message: If you would be wealthy, think of saving as well as getting.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: Money is usually attracted, not pursued.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Many folks think they aren't good at earning money, when what they don't know is how to use it.
quotes.name: Frank A. Clark

quotes.message: I'm Master of Coin. Saving money is important.
quotes.name: David Benioff

quotes.message: Beware of the impulse monster; he will eat you alive.
quotes.name: Dave Ramsey

quotes.message: Look for money mentor for advice and accountability.
quotes.name: Dave Ramsey

quotes.message: Men and women view money differently, so be sensitive to differences.
quotes.name: Dave Ramsey

quotes.message: Being frugal may be understood by different people differently.
quotes.name: M. Naveed

quotes.message: Saving money and spending wisely is necessary because every human beings goes through different ups and downs of life and as such has different sources of earning money.
quotes.name: M. Naveed

quotes.message: If you do not save for mishaps or unexpected situations, .you may have to face severe difficulties and problems in such events.
quotes.name: M. Naveed

quotes.message: It is a habit of many frugal people to keep aside money on regular basis. They use this money to cover unforeseen events and situations.
quotes.name: M. Naveed

quotes.message: Saving can be done for the purpose of enjoying life and making luxury trips to exotic places.
quotes.name: M. Naveed

quotes.message: Saving money is personal and you have to decide how much you want to pay yourself each week, month or year.
quotes.name: Kael Dixon

quotes.message: As you grow accustomed to saving, you'll quickly find that you can increase the amount that you save every paycheck or every month.
quotes.name: Kael Dixon

quotes.message: When it comes to saving, you can save some of your money, you can save half of your money or you can save all of your money. The choice is yours.
quotes.name: Kael Dixon

quotes.message: Remember, how much you save is less important than how you save.
quotes.name: Kael Dixon

quotes.message: The benefit of active savings is that you have cash readily available when you need it most.
quotes.name: Kael Dixon

quotes.message: Remember to be realistic about the amount you can actually save in the beginning. Saving a small amount each month and leaving it in savings is much more productive financially and psychologically.
quotes.name: Judy Lawrence

quotes.message: Financial discussions are also important to share with the whole family. Remember, you are being the financial role model for your children.
quotes.name: Judy Lawrence

quotes.message: The encouragement of saving occupied a prominent place in transnational discussions of social and economic policy.
quotes.name: Sheldon Garon

quotes.message: Small savings has been vital historically for reasons that go well beyond the economic.
quotes.name: Sheldon Garon

quotes.message: Various motives have been identified as to why people save, and survey evidence suggests that people know why they should save.
quotes.name: Cordell O. Lampeer

quotes.message: The best way to predict the future is to create the one you want.
quotes.name: Cordell O. Lampeer

quotes.message: Saving money doesn't have to be hard! Easily make more room in your budget.
quotes.name: Bruce Lubin

quotes.message: Saving money is its own reward. Saving money is probably the best antidote for overspending.
quotes.name: Mary Hunt

quotes.message: Saving money quiets the I-have-to-have-everything-now monster that runs so many of us ragged.
quotes.name: Mary Hunt

quotes.message: Saving money will bolster your attitude and give you the strength and courage to face the temporary sacrifices that may be required to get your money life straightened out.
quotes.name: Mary Hunt

quotes.message: Your children need to see a substantial reward for saving money and they need to see it in relatively short increments of time.
quotes.name: Sergio Dinaro

quotes.message: Learning how to save money is really about learning how to control the impulse to spend money.
quotes.name: Sergio Dinaro

quotes.message: Other little changes can yield big savings.
quotes.name: Ken Monyoncho

quotes.message: Would you rather spend your tomorrow today or save today and spend it tomorrow?
quotes.name: Ken Monyoncho

quotes.message: Saving money is a matter of the mind such that the state of mind is critical of you are to start saving.
quotes.name: Ken Monyoncho

quotes.message: Once the decision to save is made, you need to exercise personal discipline until it becomes a habit.
quotes.name: Ken Monyoncho

quotes.message: So even though spending money is arguably more exciting, you should consider saving money a priority.
quotes.name: Larry Dyson

quotes.message: Sometimes the best way to start saving money is simply to become more aware of your finances and spending habits.
quotes.name: Larry Dyson

quotes.message: With an understanding of your budget and your true needs, you may start putting away more money than you ever expected.
quotes.name: Larry Dyson

quotes.message: Think about spending a bit more money on things that will last you longer.
quotes.name: Larry Dyson

quotes.message: Establishing a budget is the act of deciding how much if your money you're going to spend on one item, how much on another, and so on, before you're actually in the position of spending the money.
quotes.name: Tere Stouffer
